workflow.meta: 其他业务审批流程(需质控审核)

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg: '请按照公司涉军项目管理要求，履行线下审批程序!'

result.display-name: 资本市场部人员发起/质控

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s1=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM DUAL WHERE ? IN (SELECT ID FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION START WITH ID IN (10023,13831) CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID)",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])
s1==1

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMLX where SFTZ=1 and id = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.XMLX]);
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt1 == 0 && cnt2 > 0

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMLX where SFTZ=1 and id = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.XMLX]);
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt1 > 0 && cnt2 > 0

step.name: 投资银行总部文管审批
投资银行总部职能审批
投资银行总部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var a=ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.gdzqWorkflowWebservice.workflowSamples.InternalDocumentsJavabean");
var oaid=a.creatNewWorkFlow("lcIB_FYWSPB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,-1,$Login.User,'100000');
var ret = LB_sqlProcedure("{call ecif.pro_ib_oaresulthandle(:ral{int},:ret,?,?,?,?)}",[oaid,O_WORKFLOW.ID,"lcIB_FYWSPB",$Login.User]); 
ABS_SETRETNOTE(ret.get('ret'));
if(ret.get('ral')>0){
  true;
}else{
  false;
}

function.name: lb.Assert
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var status=ABS_SQLVALUE("select max(status) from ECIF.tib_oawfhandle where upper(lcbd)=upper('lcIB_FYWSPB') and lcbdid=?",[O_WORKFLOW.ID]);
status==1

result.display-name: 质控/资本市场部人员发起

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition

var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQR.OrgID]);

condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var s=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.OS_CURRENTSTEP T,JGCRM.LBWFCURRENTOWNER A WHERE T.ID = A.STEPID AND T.ENTRY_ID = ? AND T.STEP_ID = 122 AND A.OWNER = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.InstID,$Login.User]);
if (s>0){
LB_workAction("lcIB_FYWSPB",O_WORKFLOW.ID,123,"");
ABS_flushObjCache('WORKFLOW.TASK')
}
